item.description:
Sunday March 7th (weather permitting)

1:00 p.m. launch from Pierce Island

Depending on who shows up and skill level will determine where we go. Possibly ocean paddle if everyone has the skills or maybe just up Sagamore Creek. In any event, looking for an easy paddle to dust off the cobwebs. I haven't paddled all winter except a few pool sessions.

Ocean paddle would go no further than Wallis Sands beach.

Drysuit or heavy winter weight wetsuit required. Bring all your safety equipment and a helmet if you have one, a warm beverage/snack, and change of clothes.

Off the water by 5:00 p.m.
item.name: Early Season Paddle - Pierce Island to ? and back
